onboarding_flow.content: Simple visual habit tracking with colored dots. No limits, no complexity.
onboarding_flow.goal: Establish value proposition of unlimited simple tracking

onboarding_flow.user_action: Enter habit name and choose color
onboarding_flow.content: What habit would you like to track? Choose a color for your dots.

onboarding_flow.user_action: Tap to mark today complete for their first habit
onboarding_flow.content: Tap the dot to mark today complete. See your progress grow!
onboarding_flow.goal: Experience core interaction and visual feedback

onboarding_flow.user_action: Swipe through calendar months, view dot patterns
onboarding_flow.content: Your progress appears as colored dots. Build beautiful patterns!

core_usage_flow.user_action: Open app to see today's habits
core_usage_flow.content: Quick overview of today's habits with tap targets

core_usage_flow.user_action: Tap dot to toggle completion state
core_usage_flow.content: Single tap marks complete, second tap undoes
Calendar grid showing colored dots and streak patterns

core_usage_flow.user_action: Add new habits or edit existing ones
core_usage_flow.content: List of all habits with colors and streak counts

primary_navigation.rationale: Tab bar provides instant access to core functions following iOS conventions. Today for quick daily actions, Calendar for progress visualization, Habits for management, Insights for premium analytics.

content_hierarchy.organization_principle: Task-oriented hierarchy from immediate daily actions to long-term analysis, supporting both quick check-ins and deeper reflection

home_screen.layout: Today view with large, tappable habit cards in vertical list. Each card shows habit name, colored dot for today, and current streak count.
home_screen.primary_cta: Colored dots for each habit - tap to toggle completion
home_screen.accessibility_notes: Minimum 44pt tap targets, high contrast dot colors, VoiceOver labels for streak counts and completion status

core_feature_screens.purpose: Visual progress tracking with monthly/yearly calendar grid
core_feature_screens.layout: Calendar grid with colored dots for completed days, navigation controls for switching months/years
core_feature_screens.accessibility_notes: Large calendar cells (minimum 44pt), clear date labeling, VoiceOver support for reading completion patterns

core_feature_screens.purpose: Create or modify habit tracking configuration
core_feature_screens.layout: Simple form with habit name input, color picker grid, and save/cancel buttons
core_feature_screens.accessibility_notes: Color picker includes text labels, form validation with clear error states, keyboard navigation support

core_feature_screens.purpose: Overview and management of all tracked habits
core_feature_screens.layout: List of habits with colored indicators, streak counts, and management actions
core_feature_screens.accessibility_notes: Swipe actions with VoiceOver support, clear visual hierarchy, consistent interaction patterns

core_feature_screens.layout: Charts and visualizations showing habit correlations and patterns
core_feature_screens.accessibility_notes: Chart data available in table format, clear data descriptions, alternative text for visualizations

primary_actions.feedback: Immediate visual state change with subtle animation, haptic feedback on iOS

navigation_gestures: Long press for quick habit editing
accessibility_alternatives: Voice Control commands for habit marking

visual_design_direction.brand_personality: Clean, calming, and encouraging. Minimal interface that celebrates progress without overwhelming complexity. Focus on gentle motivation rather than aggressive gamification.

color_strategy.primary: Calm blues and greens for UI elements (4.5:1 contrast ratio minimum), user-selected colors for habit dots with automatic contrast adjustment
color_strategy.secondary: Soft grays for backgrounds and inactive states, ensuring accessibility across all user-selected color combinations

typography.primary_font: San Francisco (iOS system font) for platform consistency
typography.scale_factor: Dynamic Type support with text scaling from -3 to +5 accessibility sizes
typography.readability_notes: Minimum 17pt body text, 34pt headlines, clear hierarchy with sufficient line spacing

screen_reader_support: VoiceOver labels for all habit completion states
Calendar date and completion status announcements
motor_accessibility: Minimum 44pt touch targets for all interactive elements
Gesture alternatives for all swipe actions
visual_accessibility: Dark mode with appropriate contrast adjustments
cognitive_accessibility: Clear visual hierarchy with obvious next steps
Gentle error states with helpful guidance
Optional reduced complexity mode hiding advanced features

standards_compliance.accessibility_design: All interactive elements meet 44pt minimum touch target size, color combinations achieve WCAG 2.1 AA contrast ratios (4.5:1 minimum), VoiceOver support for all functionality including calendar navigation and habit status
standards_compliance.subscription_ux: Premium features clearly distinguished with 'Pro' labels, upgrade prompts appear contextually when accessing analytics, paywall follows honest disclosure with clear feature descriptions and pricing
standards_compliance.platform_integration: Tab bar navigation follows iOS conventions, Dynamic Type support for accessibility, native iOS controls used throughout, respects system settings for dark mode and reduced motion
standards_compliance.inclusive_design: Support for reduced motion preferences, high contrast mode, voice control commands, switch control navigation, and dynamic text scaling up to 200% while maintaining usability
